solution_line_template: On Tuesday, they pick thrice as much, which will be {thrice_multiplier}*{oranges_monday} = <<{thrice_multiplier}*{oranges_monday}={oranges_tuesday}>>{oranges_tuesday} oranges.
The total number of oranges picked now is {oranges_tuesday}+{oranges_monday} = <<{oranges_tuesday}+{oranges_monday}={total_after_tuesday}>>{total_after_tuesday} oranges.
On Wednesday, he adds {oranges_wednesday} more, which will now be {total_after_tuesday}+{oranges_wednesday} = <<{total_after_tuesday}+{oranges_wednesday}={total_oranges}>>{total_oranges} oranges
